hgr::Camera Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <Camera.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::Camera:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Camera node in scene graph.

Camera contains point-of-view, field-of-view, viewport and other attributes that desribe how the scene is rendered. There can be multiple cameras in the scene.

Member Function Documentation

float hgr::Camera::back (   )  const
 

Returns back plane distance.

const math::float4x4& hgr::Camera::cachedProjectionTransform (   )  const
 

Returns projection transformation.

This function can be used only during rendering. Updated by calling cacheTransforms().

const math::float4x4& hgr::Camera::cachedScreenViewProjectionTransform (   )  const
 

Returns screen-view-projection transformation.

This function can be used only during rendering. Updated by calling cacheTransforms().

const math::float4x4& hgr::Camera::cachedViewProjectionTransform (   )  const
 

Returns view-projection transformation.

This function can be used only during rendering. Updated by calling cacheTransforms().

const math::float3x4& hgr::Camera::cachedViewTransform (   )  const
 

Returns view (=world to camera) transformation.

This function can be used only during rendering. Updated by calling cacheTransforms().

const math::float3x4& hgr::Camera::cachedWorldTransform (   )  const
 

Returns world (=camera to world) transformation.

This function can be used only during rendering. Updated by calling cacheTransforms().

void hgr::Camera::cacheTransforms (  gr::Context *  context,
const lang::Array< Node * > &  nodes
) 
 

Caches camera transforms and all world transforms from the nodes.

Used in rendering. After this method, Camera::getCachedTransform() can be used to get valid world transform for any node in the array.

void hgr::Camera::cullVisuals (  const lang::Array< Node * > &  nodes,
lang::Array< Visual * > &  visuals
) 
 

Collects all visible visuals from 'nodes' array to 'visuals' array and sorts them by ascending distance to camera.

Visuals are culled by bounding box before adding them to the array.

float hgr::Camera::front (   )  const
 

Returns front plane distance.

const math::float3x4& hgr::Camera::getCachedWorldTransform (  Node *  node  )  const
 

Returns cached world transformation for the node.

This function can be used only during rendering. (Requires that the node has been in the scene graph when Camera::cacheTransforms was called AND that the scene graph hasn't been modified after since.)

lang::Array<Light*>& hgr::Camera::getLightsSortedByDistance (  const math::float3 &  worldpos  )  const
 

Gets cached lights sorted by distance to world position.

Number of lights returned is limited to Shader::MAX_LIGHTS. This function can be used only during rendering.

float hgr::Camera::horizontalFov (   )  const
 

Returns horizontal field of view in radians.

math::float4x4 hgr::Camera::projectionTransform (   )  const
 

Returns projection transform.

LightSorter *  lightsorter

Renders the scene to the rendering context.

Parameters:

priorities Priorities to be rendered.
lightsorter Lights to be rendered.
